content.description: You'll see this from the trail and it will inspire you. Look for the obvious and massive hunk of sandstone with the incredible and long crack running uphill at a 45 degree angle. This is Fantasia.Stand start low at the very bottom of the crack at the easy to find jug lobe. Follow the steep arete and crack all the way to the corner. Round the corner and mantle onto the slab face and then continue the journey another 15ft to the apex.Bring every pad and all your friends and their pads. The landing is very rocky, full of huge gaps and blocks, and needs lots of pads.
content.location: You'll see this from the trail and it will inspire you. Look for the obvious and massive hunk of sandstone with the incredible and long crack running uphill at a 45 degree angle. This is Fantasia.

content.description: This is the giant, beautiful face you see on the left side of the trail just before reaching Casablanca on the right. The who formation is enormous, and the side is home to the lovely and terrifying "Fantasia" (V7).
